website_summaries.verdict: Delivers effective low-fat dog food at a reasonable price point per pound versus others.
pros: Has a reduced-fat and reduced-calorie formula that's perfect for overweight dogs
Uses antioxidants and vitamins to improve immune health
Includes only natural ingredients in the formula
Dog food is made in America, so you can trust the quality of the ingredients
cons: Undergoing a slight change in formula, so your dog may not tolerate the new blend

customer_reviews.title: Same price, 3 lbs less food.
customer_reviews.text: We've fed this food to my Lab for years (the big bag). Recently, though, Hills Science updated the design on the packaging and removed 3lbs of food from the bag but kept the price the same. Previous bags were 33lbs. The new ones are 30lbs. Not cool. I don't think they changed the ingredients, my dog still seems to like it the same. And it smells the same (different shape though). Just less food in the bag. EDITED NOV 2019: And now the price has increased by $4.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Taste the Science
customer_reviews.text: I love Hills in general. They put their money into nutrition research as opposed to marketing. As an animal scientist, I know that but veterinarians and animal nutritionists work to formulate Hills diets to fit all your pets needs. I had my dog on Hills Large Breed, and she just needed to lose a few pounds. 3/4 of the way through the bag and she is at her ideal body weight. I’m going to keep her on it but bump up the amount to maintenance level because the extra fiber has really helped her bowls. I’m very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Haylee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dog hast lost about 10lbs in a month using this food and he loves it. I also replaced his fatty snacks with carrots and he’s crazy over carrots. Finally a good nutritional dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Dog food
customer_reviews.text: I can't give it 5 stars for Flavor since I never have tasted it. I have used this food in different flavors for 40 years and never had any problem. Our four Large dogs eat it all the time and have no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lanny Taylor

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Switched to this food on a vet recommendation after my dog gained 20 lbs in a year (oops). We've been using it for a month and while I don't have a way to weigh him, (He's a 115 pound golden retriever) he's definitely looking slimmer. Bonus that he seems to love the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: My two boxers and lab eat this as meals and as treats. They have been on this exact same food for approximately 6 year now and all are awesome looking and healthy. I highly recommend this food if you have large breed dogs.
customer_reviews.author: ISpend2MuchonAmazon

customer_reviews.title: My dog did poorly on the science diet though it was recommended by my vet.
customer_reviews.text: After being on this food for 4 months, my dog developed red sores on her paws, mouth and a painful rash on he inside of her arm. Since I have taken her off this food, she has been doing much better. I would not recommend this food to any dog with skin issues. The ingredients are not impressive.
customer_reviews.author: ESP Vegan

customer_reviews.title: Picky Chow Chows LOVE Hills!
customer_reviews.text: My picky Chow Chows LOVE Hills Science Diet. I've always bought good, quality food for my furry kids but it seems one or the other always had diarrhea, UNTIL I fed them Hills. Neither one has had anything but nice firm bowel movements. They receive the dry kibble everyday and an occasional can of Hills wet food which they literally drool over. Hill's cost more than the Bil-Jac I used to feed them but its worth every penny. I can tell the "kids" feel better and they love it. WIN-WIN!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Quality diet dog food
customer_reviews.text: I have two 60 ish lb dogs. One is six one is 5 years old. Both are mixed breeds. The vet recommended switching to a diet food for my older dog since she’s started to gain weight. This brand was on the list as one of the more budget Friendly options. Now all Specialty dog food that is high-quality is expensive. But this one was high-quality for a decent price. I switch between this brand And a more expensive brand each month. That helps with cost savings a bit When I switched the dogs to this food it did not cause any issues or upset their stomachs they seem to like it
customer_reviews.author: Megan Soileau

customer_reviews.title: Seems like good quality, but my old girl is picky.
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn’t seem to be losing weight and while I like this food, especially the price, she will leave it I the bowl for hours and sometimes even overnight. So I think she’s not thrilled with the taste and will only eat when she’s really hungry.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Harlow

customer_reviews.title: Great for tase, weight loss, and food allergies
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Our lab and golden mix love this food and they have lost considerable weight to bring them down to their target weights. The golden mix has skin allergies associated with certain kinds of dog foods which makes finding the appropriate weight loss and skin sensitive foods difficult. This food fits both the categories. We will continue to use this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Thome

customer_reviews.title: Helped my dog lose weight while still enjoying his food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. He has been eating science diet food since he was born but he became overweight (100 pounds with a 55 pound weight goal) and our vet had us switch to this type of food immediately while also placing him on a very strict portion-control diet. It has been 2 months and he’s 75 pounds. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Delivery to my door!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My rottie eats it... she’s spoiled rotten. I love the fact the 40lb bag is delivered to the house!! No more dragging a bag across a store to the cart to the car and into the house!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We need a dog food that's not full of fillers.
customer_reviews.text: I have three dogs. I was trying to keep their weight down. But this dog food made my dogs have so many bowel movements... Too much bowel movements for me. And them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bag not good
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this for six months. This last bag my 13 yr old lab did not like it. My one year old lab who will eat anything ate it a couple days and had diarrhea multiple times the day she ate it don’t know what is wrong with this batch. Noticed another review where same thing happened
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nutritional
customer_reviews.text: My dog is special and I want the best for him. Other foods we tried didn't agree with him. My vet recommends Hills Science and my dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She likes it
customer_reviews.text: I just switched my dog from large breed to the large breed light. She likes it. I was a little worried because she can be a picky eater. All my dogs are on some kind of science diet. My vet recommended it when she was a puppy and we have stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: james adam

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food and it helps with her weight management. Our golden retriever was 85 pounds and our vet said she needed to lose 10 pounds. About 6 months after switching to this food and increasing her daily walking and she had lost the 10 pounds! She looks and feels much healthier now!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: love this product
customer_reviews.text: my lab was on the other pricey dog food, always had issues with vomiting and soft stools. Switched to Hills and no more squishey suprises in the morning in bare feet and stools are firm, which helps with her anal glands. Overall very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: fishfin

customer_reviews.title: Good product ... Slow delivery
customer_reviews.text: Quality product delivered right to your door. I know that they probably won't express ship a 30-pound box next-day to your door, but I had to wait 2 1/2 weeks for the product to arrive. Also, I ordered vitamins at the same time, and they just put those in the same box, so I waited 2 1/2 weeks for vitamins also. I'll order again, but next time I'll know to give it more lead time, and order anything else as a separate order.
customer_reviews.author: KDowning

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a dog food that would feed my two large dogs and one small that it was high protein enough but also less fattening this seems to be the great balance between the two and my dogs love the taste
customer_reviews.author: Heather Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My dog loves it and his coat and body structure is great!
customer_reviews.author: JenRip

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great dog food! My dog has lost 17lbs in less then 2 months. Vet was super happy. He's still a tubby meathead but I'm sure in a couple more months he should be at his goal weight.
customer_reviews.author: Frankenstein

customer_reviews.title: My dog like it
customer_reviews.text: My chocolate lab ❤️S it They have changed the bag to a Velcro strip to close it. I thought this was a good idea until I realized it doesn’t hold very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tangie Rumbold

customer_reviews.title: Great weight management food for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended Hill's Science Diet weight management food for my overweight dog. We have been using for about a month and my dog appears to have lost some weight. He loves to eat so he loves the taste:)
customer_reviews.author: Marggiesue

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves This!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old yellow lab has been exclusively eating this for the past 6 year and loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Hohler

customer_reviews.title: Delivered intact, every time.
customer_reviews.text: I love getting my dog’s food delivered, especially during the pandemic. This is my 4th shipment, and not once has the box or bag been damaged in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Baci

customer_reviews.title: great stuff
customer_reviews.text: THE food of super lab lucy ! Has kept her weight down in the and her energy high
customer_reviews.author: james shear

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a good price..and vet recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Our oncologist recommended this product for our dog who has cancer. My pup loves the taste of it and the price is reasonable unlike some of the other expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: M.Browne

customer_reviews.title: Dog food for weight loss
customer_reviews.text: My dog was 10 pound overweight and I looked up reviews and decided to try this dog food. He lost about 5 pounds already, along with increased activity as well, but he loves this food! He used to wait an hour or two before eating, now as soon as I put his food down he gobbles it up! Great product, he seems to love the taste too!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Szczerba

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Ideal protein is 20%.This food is 19%maybe.Which I cannot understand,since most Vet's recommend it.My 12 year old Catahoula mix is suffering from Cancer,so I bought this hoping to get some more weight on her and for the added nutrition.So,far she is eating this.I am putting my faith in the quality of the product.It has been around for years and I have never heard anything negative.I would recommend this food.
customer_reviews.author: Marino Anne

customer_reviews.title: Flavor?
customer_reviews.text: Really Amazon? You want my opinion on the flavor of this product? No, just no. Dogs like it, it keeps their weight in check.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Otto

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product
customer_reviews.text: Too late to change this, but you should know I didn’t order the large breed food. I have been ordering the Hill’s perfect weight adult dog food for months. And I regularly click on the order again option next to the food icon. Has always worked before. Fortunately my dog is large so it is not a disaster. Just that the other food has worked well. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Forjoss

customer_reviews.title: Happy Dog
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended this food a few years ago for my Aussie/Lab mix. She absolute loves it. Even with the reformulation, there hasn't been a change in her eating habits.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Z.

customer_reviews.title: Dry Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by our vet. Dog appeared to enjoy the meal and the bag was of the handy weight.
customer_reviews.author: JBH

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: This food must taste good because my dogs love it.
customer_reviews.author: Goldenhawk

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it! I gave the flavor and quality 5 stars because she eats it up in no time at all, so she must love it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Product Review
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this product. It's the best food they have ever eaten.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling K M Nuesca

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this. The pieces are a little big but she really likes it. I noticed a huge difference in her attitude and behavior after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Only the Best for my Guy!
customer_reviews.text: You can not beat the quality that is put into Hill's brand products. My guy was a rescue and since he's been on Hill's brand his coat has showed complete change, his over all mobility and personality has completely changed!
customer_reviews.author: K. A.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves it and he has lost 5 Pounds and didn't even know
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Quality dog food
customer_reviews.text: Bogey loves this food and the dog on the package is a splitting image of him.
customer_reviews.author: David Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Home delivery is very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly and well packed. Home delivery is very convenient. All four of my dogs like the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Junan Heath

customer_reviews.title: Great weight loss product
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. She’s already lost 8 pounds! Has to lose a little more, but she’s on the right path with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Peveto

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: My dog was recently diagnosed with pancreatitis and this had a low crude fat content. He likes the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog!
customer_reviews.text: Has kept my dog happy and healthy! And that’s the most important thing!
customer_reviews.author: BryanM14

product_meta.title: Hill's Science Diet Dry Dog Food, Adult, Large Breed, Light for Weight Management, Chicken Meal & Barley Recipe
product_meta.description:
Size:30 LB

Just because your dog is big in size, it doesn't mean their pet food should be big in calories. Hill's Science Diet Large Breed Light Adult dry dog food is precise nutrition for less active adult large breed dogs that require a low-calorie pet food to maintain a healthy weight & lifestyle. This dog food made with natural ingredients provides L-carnitine to promote an ideal bodyweight and healthy heart function, healthy mobility, in your big canine. High-quality protein and natural fibers help your dog stay satiated between each meal, while omega-6s and vitamin E nourish your large dog's skin and support a shiny, healthy coat. There’s more to love with the new look of Science Diet. Some of our products also have new names, new kibble shapes & new formulas.

Feeding Instructions

Ideal Weight of Dog Weight Loss (cups) Weight Management (cups) 50 lb 2 2/3 3 3/4 60 lb 3 4 1/3 80 lb 3 3/4 5 1/3 90 lb 4 1/4 5 3/4 100 lb 4 1/2 6 1/3 110 lb 4 3/4 6 3/4 120 lb 5 1/4 7 1/4 130 lb 5 1/2 7 2/3 140 lb 5 3/4 8 1/4 160 lb 6 1/2 9 Adjust feeding amounts as necessary to maintain optimal weight. If you are unsure, ask your veterinarian.

Transition Instructions A gradual transition to a new pet food is important to avoid digestive upset. To transition, mix your pet’s current food with the new food. Over 7 days, gradually decrease the amount of the current pet food while increasing the amount of new pet food.
feature_bullets: An adult dry food with 18% lower calories vs. Science Diet Large Breed dogs
A light dog food with L-carnitine to promote ideal body weight, support healthy mobility and a healthy heart
Keeps your large dog satisfied between meals with high-quality protein and natural fibers
Nourishes your big dog's skin and supports a shiny coat with omega-6 fatty acids and vitamin E
Made in the USA with global ingredients you can trust
